inscription.text: (From left top) 1. A sketch of a government building and a busy road in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 2. A baby fairy in an untitled label ; 3. Gateway to India, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 4. A vehicle in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; (second row from left) 5. A fountain and two heads of elephants in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 6. Three feathers, in a label of Imperial Chemical Industries (India) Ltd.; 7. Gateway to India, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 8. A mermaid, in a label of Geigy; 9. Two peacoks, in a label of Geigy; 10. A fountain and two heads of elephants in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 11. Goddess Lakshmi with two elephants, in a Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 12. A female Hindu deity, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 13. Taj Mahal, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 14. Goddess Lakshmi with two elephants, in a Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 15. Gateway to India, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 16. A warrior on a horse, in a label of Geigy; 17. A Hindu deity ; 18. A bull, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art"
